H0.text: The collective noun for which British mammal is a 'cete'? [say “Seat”]. Otter

H1.text: The collective noun for which British mammal is a 'cete'? [say “Seat”]. Fox

H2.text: The collective noun for which British mammal is a 'cete'? [say “Seat”]. Squirrel

H3.text: The collective noun for which British mammal is a 'cete'? [say “Seat”]. Badger

A4.text: A collective name suggested for a group of colonial badgers is a cete, but badger colonies are more often called clans.
